author: Carter Sherman, Anne Torpey
title: A Court Just Let Texas Ban Abortions Due to Coronavirus
description: It reversed an order to stop the state from using the pandemic as a reason to restrict abortion access.
content:
Just a day after a judge ordered Texas to stop using the coronavirus pandemic as a reason to restrict abortion access, a U.S. appeals court has temporarily halted that order allowing the state to once again limit abortions.
 Over the last few weeks, as publi… [+4222 chars]
